articles.title: Air India crash: Devastating tragedy threatens carrier's ambitious turnaround - BBC
articles.description: The tragedy happened as Air India was on the "final climb phrase" of its brand transformation after the Tata buyout
articles.content:
Nikhil Inamdar
Archana Shukla
Relatives and neighbours of 14-year-old Akash Patni, one of the crash victims, mourn as they wait for his body 
Days after the devastating Air India-171 crash killed … [+6876 chars]
